movies.title: Little Miss Sunshine
movies.description: A family determined to get their young daughter into the finals of a beauty pageant take a cross-country trip in their VW bus.
movies.actors: Abigail Breslin, Greg Kinnear, Paul Dano, Alan Arkin

movies.title: Scent of a Woman
movies.description: A prep school student needing money agrees to "babysit" a blind man, but the job is not at all what he anticipated.
movies.actors: Al Pacino, Chris O'Donnell, James Rebhorn, Gabrielle Anwar

movies.title: Inception
movies.description: A thief, who steals corporate secrets through use of dream-sharing technology, is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.
movies.actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Ellen Page, Tom Hardy

movies.title: Batman
movies.description: The Dark Knight of Gotham City begins his war on crime with his first major enemy being the clownishly homicidal Joker.
movies.actors: Michael Keaton, Jack Nicholson, Kim Basinger, Robert Wuhl

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.
movies.actors: Ellen Burstyn, Matthew McConaughey, Mackenzie Foy, John Lithgow

movies.title: Thank You for Smoking
movies.description: Satirical comedy follows the machinations of Big Tobacco's chief spokesman, Nick Naylor, who spins on behalf of cigarettes while trying to remain a role model for his twelve-year-old son.
movies.actors: Joan Lunden, Eric Haberman, Aaron Eckhart, Mary Jo Smith

movies.title: Burn After Reading
movies.description: A disk containing the memoirs of a CIA agent ends up in the hands of two unscrupulous gym employees who attempt to sell it.
movies.actors: George Clooney, Frances McDormand, Brad Pitt, John Malkovich

movies.title: No Country for Old Men
movies.description: Violence and mayhem ensue after a hunter stumbles upon a drug deal gone wrong and more than two million dollars in cash near the Rio Grande.
movies.actors: Tommy Lee Jones, Javier Bardem, Josh Brolin, Woody Harrelson

movies.title: Arrival
movies.description: When 12 mysterious spacecraft appear around the world, linguistics professor Louise Banks is tasked with interpreting the language of the apparent alien visitors.
movies.actors: Amy Adams, Jeremy Renner, Forest Whitaker, Michael Stuhlbarg

movies.title: Chaplin
movies.description: A film about the troubled and controversial life of the master comedy filmmaker Charles Chaplin.
movies.actors: Robert Downey Jr., Geraldine Chaplin, Paul Rhys, John Thaw

movies.title: Lola
movies.description: In post-war West Germany, the charming Von Bohm is appointed a city's new Building Commissioner. His morality is tested when he unknowingly falls in love with a brothel worker, Lola, the paid mistress of a corrupt property developer.
movies.actors: Barbara Sukowa, Armin Mueller-Stahl, Mario Adorf, Matthias Fuchs

movies.title: Pure
movies.description: Katarina is 20 years old. With a troubled past in a dreary suburb, her life seems to be already set in stone - until she discovers music. Everything changes when she hears a performance of ...
movies.actors: Alicia Vikander, Samuel Fröler, Josephine Bauer, Martin Wallström

movies.title: The Man of Steal
movies.description: Los Angeles... A place where the brave and the ignorant flock to alike seeking fame and fortune in the City of Angels. Our hero drives frantically, lost in the concrete jungle, unaware of the adventure that is about to unfold.
movies.actors: Tivo Benavides, Victor Benavides, Albert Brocca, David Brocca
